rosters.name: IT GIRLZ
rosters.description:
## hiiiiiiiiiiiii we are the IT GIRLZ
- **`cs`** -  **`time`**: `like, the essence of fashionably late or perfectly on time.`
- **`fs`** -  **`thyme`**: `a hint of spice in our code, just like in our kitchen.`
- **`r`** -    **`eunsoo`**: `the name that's as sweet and unique as a limited-edition lip gloss.`
- **`p`** -   **`pureblue`**: `the colour of the sky on a perfect summer day, or maybe a chic nail polish.`
- **`d`** -   **`poisy`**` (good small horce): like a pocket-sized unicorn, rare and adorable.`
- **`m`** -   **`ravu4`**: `our ride for mall hauls and beach trips, packed with style and fun.`

## totally trendy substitutions
- **`subs`**: 
  **`freaky`** `` **`sao`** `333` `^-^`
